channel.title: ~Need Help on changing Wild Zone to Safe Zone~
channel.description:
Just need a tut for this, unless you want to explain it yourself. Thanks!
P.S. If anyone wants to help me in remaking "Kramerscape" to as close as possible, add my MSN - Btforbes27@live.com P.S.S. I need help on making the attack delay less so it hits a ton like Kramerscape aswell.

item.title: ~Need Help on changing Wild Zone to Safe Zone~
item.dc:creator: @forest419 forest419
item.description:
@forest419 wrote:

Its all of Varrock except buildings.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 12, 2009, 09:32:45 pm[/size][hr]Uhm, Still having troubles. I want to just make like an area everywhere in varrock except wild to north a safe place. Can somebody find out how that works out. I get the general concept but idk exactly.

Read full topic
item.source: ~Need Help on changing Wild Zone to Safe Zone~

item.title: ~Need Help on changing Wild Zone to Safe Zone~
item.dc:creator: @the1337legend the1337legend
item.description:
@the1337legend wrote:

Not all servers use non wild, if it’s a small location, remove it from isInWilderness. or w.e yourmethod is.

Read full topic
item.source: ~Need Help on changing Wild Zone to Safe Zone~

item.title: ~Need Help on changing Wild Zone to Safe Zone~
item.dc:creator: @jose3121 jose3121
item.description:
@jose3121 wrote:

lol i asked that question yesterday apperently no 1 answered so i had to test stuff out in my client.java and then i got it

search public boolean nonWild in ur client.java and at the last one it should look like this:
if ((absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3258 && absY >= 3438 && absY <= 3431)
|| (absX >= 2847 && absX <= 2874 && absY >= 9830 && absY <= 9854)
|| (absX >= 2401 && absX <= 2405 && absY >= 3098 && absY <= 3102)
|| (absX >= 2820 && absX <= 2876 && absY >= 2950 && absY <= 3004)
|| (absX >= 2667 && absX <= 2684 && absY >= 3717 && absY <= 3732)
|| (absX >= 3033 && absX <= 3036 && absY >= 4842 && absY <= 4844)
|| (absX >= 2687 && absX <= 2677 && absY >= 3720 && absY <= 3733)
|| (absX >= 3229 && absX <= 3242 && absY >= 9796 && absY <= 9807)
|| (absX >= 2442 && absX <= 2487 && absY >= 4808 && absY <= 4855)
|| (absX >= 2581 && absX <= 2589 && absY >= 4834 && absY <= 4842)
|| (absX >= 2712 && absX <= 2720 && absY >= 4832 && absY <= 4840)
|| (absX >= 2654 && absX <= 2662 && absY >= 4837 && absY <= 4845)
|| (absX >= 2837 && absX <= 2851 && absY >= 4826 && absY <= 4842)
|| (absX >= 2859 && absX <= 2868 && absY >= 9881 && absY <= 9883)

then at the last on copy one and paste it and add your coords im not a good explainer but if ur not mental or stupid u shud get this lol

Read full topic
